title: Reeve

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to create a Manhunt for. Manhunts only last for two nights. You cannot create Manhunts against Unseen players.
- During the day, you may shoot a player. One use per day, and does not reveal who shot them. 0 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When a player with a Manhunt is hanged, you gain 1 use of your gun.
- Retain your Background upon being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.

desc:
Post 4711
*It's okay, they won't arrest me.*
